section.title: site types creating new Site Type
section.para: To create a new Site Type, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Site Type, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a unique code to identify the Site Type.
Enter a description to further identify the Site Type.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating a Site Type, returning you to the previous screen.
Creates the Site Type and adds it to the master list of Site Types.
